title: 4C/ID Model-Based VR Automotive Painting Vocational Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic automotive painting terminology and safety protocols
context.additional_context: Provides practical VR technology-based training for current practitioners. Enhances real-time feedback and collaborative learning in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: They perform automotive surface defect analysis and painting procedures with 90% accuracy in VR environments
Applying the 4C/ID model's whole-task learning assignments to solve complex problems similar to real workplace scenarios
They fully master (100%) safety accident prevention procedures through virtual simulation of painting equipment
They design paint quality management processes through role allocation with team members in collaborative VR environments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
